parameters: How can I help you today?
Hm... Nothing really in my price range right now.
Can I ask you your name?
You're the only one that works here?
Haha, no... my family owns the place.
I do work a lot but I'm only here
when I'm on breaks from school.
Oh cool, do you go to the University too?
Nice, I'm starting my first semester...
Anything I should know about, any like,
Just steer clear of the Dean, he's got
a serious stick up his ass.
Oops - I'm sorry I swore, that was
No no it's fine, don't even worry about
Ok, cool... Well, it was nice meeting you...?
Nice to meet you too, I hope
I can see you around at school!
What can I do for you today?
Wow, you got a little bit of everything here.
*Sigh* That’s the thing, \N[001], we’re a little TOO old-
fashioned if you get my meaning.
See my dad is pretty handy, but he’s one of those “Why buy
something new when the old machine still works or can be
It took forever to convince him to start stocking
last year’s discounted Rye Phones to bring in some sales.
Drag N’ Drop is killing us right now...
Drag N’Drop? That's the new store that opened in the mall
last year - the dragon logo on the front, right?
That’s them alright. They’re a chain electronics store
that’s opening up all over the country. Their inventory is
insane, and they have 24 hour tech-support!
We can’t afford that kind of product, I’m only here a few
hours a week because of school, and Dad has been feeling
The store might be in trouble if we can’t come up with
Geez, Lucia. I had no idea you were under such stress.
Is there anything I can do to help?
Oh don’t worry about me, I’ll think of something.
I’m a smart girl, and this is just another problem that
needs fixing. I appreciate your concern, \N[001], really.
But enough about that, what brings you here today?
I have this... This washing machine at home, I was hoping
It runs fine at the moment, but I’m concerned about long-
term maintenance and wanted to know if you could help
me find a user manual for it.
Wow, Lucia, you got all of that from a model number?
*Giggle* Like I said, I’m a smart girl. I’ve been picking
apart machines since I was like five, and I built my own
computer at home with the parts coming in through the store.
This is nothing. However, you should really
consider buying a new washing machine, \N[001].
Why is that? Seems to work fine right now...
This particular appliance is sort of infamous in the repair
world. It was recalled a few years ago, and jokingly
referred to as “The Mangler” by technicians.
This thing isn’t going to explode on me the
next time I do a load of shorts, is it?
Ha! No, nothing that severe I’m afraid. But put it at the
wrong setting, and your shorts are going to come out
It’s even more likely to happen with strong bleach too.
<This is exactly the kind of “accident” I need to get rid
of Mom’s old workout clothes! I should see about
getting some bleach too, increase my chances of success.>
Damn, glad I stopped by then! Could you maybe provide a
manual, write down the settings? You know... So I DON’T
make such a horrible mistake in the near future?
Sure! Let me just use the computer here
and see if I can print out what you need.
And there you go! Try not to destroy
Awesome! Thank you, Lucia. You’ve been a huge
help for me today. So what do I owe you?
We’ll call this one a freebie. I appreciate you coming in
here over Drag N’Drop, and you’re sweet to listen to my
us again for your tech needs.
You got yourself a deal, Lucia. I’ll see you at school.
Thank you for shopping with Tech Works!
<I got the manual, but I could double my odds with some
bleach. There should be some over at the grocers right here,

Hi Lucia, I’m... Interested in these hidden cameras.
Oh..? Looking to step up your home security?
Ok, cool. Well Let me show you how to set them up.
These are actually a pretty good model - small, waterproof,
and wireless signaling allows them to backup the video
footage to a cloud server every 12 hours.
Nice... I didn’t get most of that, but they sound cool.
Basically they’ll do what they say, really well.
Just turn the aperture to activate and let them
sync to your device and they’re good to go.
Thanks Lucia, if I have any issues I’ll be sure to ask you!
Of course, thanks for buying them
